content: Unfortunately, the message list often uses a black font on a dark background. here the screenshot with a bold black font (unread) and here the one with a standard black font (read), where nearly anything is readable.

content:
Hello there We have read the question We try to help

I could not get connected to the server. That error message appeared on that desktop or laptop screen.


The first thing to do is to create a new profile and to move the bookmarks that are there to the other profile ,then things are fixed and you are ok to use the new profile and remove the old one.

Also VPN use could block certain subjects. Try to turnt it off and see if it solve some of the issue here . Antivirus programs like Avast, Kaspersky ,BitDefender there use of them could behave aggressive to some other subjects like blocking traffic and is creating that error of you it can be.Methods of syncing with desktop and mobile devices the use of WiFi or cable usage ,the Firefox profile of that program is been corrupt of that ,try to get a new profile.

Greetings Firefox volunteer
creator: Googlethunderbird
